globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https: data: blob: 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src 'self' https: wss: ws: http://localhost:* https://*.azurewebsites.net https://*.blob.core.windows.net; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' blob:; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:;
